title: So good to share
creator_credit: John Kingsford-Smith, Kingcroft Productions and Cinevex
brief_description: Features wine and winemaking in the Barossa Valley of South Australia by German settlers in 1836. First grapes planted 1847, harvested in 1850. Views of grape picking, pressing and storage. The film shows the general life around the area.
description: Features wine and winemaking in the Barossa Valley of South Australia by German settlers in 1836. First grapes planted 1847, harvested in 1850. Views of grape picking, pressing and storage. The film shows the general life around the area.
